name: Knock
description: Choose an object you can see within range that is locked, stuck, or barred. A loud knock is audible from as far away as 300 feet. The target is opened (or unlocked) for 10 minutes if it is a mundane lock, or suppresses one Arcane Lock spell on it for the duration. If the object has multiple locks, only one is unlocked.

effects.description: Unlocks or opens one locked/stuck object; suppresses Arcane Lock for 10 minutes; audible knock heard up to 300 feet.
